cast.name: 本木·马克斯特德 Motoki Maxted

introduction: Sarah is just trying to "be audit she can be. After finally quitting her job at a major public firm, Sarah finds herself as the Senior Accountant for SUNRYZER A.I., a fast-track to IPO tech start-up that is preparing for their annual year-end audit. While she's trying to make a good impression, her new accounting team of Hunter and Makayla isn't making it easy for her to focus on work. Meanwhile she doesn't get much support from her Manager Tracy , Controller Dave, or CFO Jessica. On top of all her normal work duties, she finds herself caught up in workplace drama thanks to top-notch auditor Lindsey and a nosy janitor. This workplace comedy sheds light onto the hilarious scenarios CPAs, staff accountants, and audit professionals find themselves in on a daily basis.
